creator: hoffmanja@attbi.com
text:
Avik, per our e-mail exchange yesterday, here is a patch to add a few more token
Id's to Ptg.java.  This essentially captures the other 2 token values for each
Ptg record where applicable.  This was tested and now captures the "5a" value
which was causing the exception.  ( I am using EventModel ).  

Patch coming....

creator: hoffmanja@attbi.com
text:
Created attachment 2072
Patch to Ptg.java allowing match of known token ids...

creator: avik@apache.org
text:
Applied. Thanks a lot. Could you cross check? Someday hopefully we'll have a 
factory impl that removes the long line of case statements.
